str2: That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A lamp. From the base of leukos; a portable lamp or other illuminator.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To ignite, light, burn, lit. and met; I consume with fire. Apparently a primary verb; to set on fire, i.e. Kindle or consume.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
To exult, be full of joy. From agan and hallomai; properly, to jump for joy, i.e. Exult.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
